author: RT
title: Russia’s Sber launches Bitcoin-linked bonds
description: Russia’s largest lender has offered crypto-linked investments, with plans to expand listings on the Moscow Exchange Read Full Article at RT.com
content: Russia’s largest lender, Sber (formerly Sberbank), has introduced structured bonds tied to Bitcoin, according to an announcement on the bank’s website. The new financial product tracks both the price… [+2677 chars]
